page.title: 04LANDSCAPE
page.content: GREENHAM In Greenham there is a very ancient house known as Greenham Barton.It is very beautiful. The owners are Mr & Mrs Willis. Mr Willis is a well known artist. There is also a large house nearby called Greenham Hall. It stands on a hill. There are rumours that the Hall is haunted. Below the Hall is the only shop in our block, the post office and general store. It is approached by a long flight of steps up the steep hillside. The river Tone flows through Greenham. There is a pretty little church beside the bridge. One year there was a flood and you could not drive through it for fear of water going up the exhaust pipe.
